titleStmt.title: A proclamation, offering a reward to such as shall discover and apprehend any of these persons guilty of a late horrid villany and assasination made upon the Tovvn Major of Edinburgh, and others
Proclamations. 1679-03-12
titleStmt.author: Scotland. Privy Council.

titleStmt.title: A proclamation, offering a reward to such as shall discover and apprehend any of these persons guilty of a late horrid villany and assasination made upon the Tovvn Major of Edinburgh, and others
Proclamations. 1679-03-12
titleStmt.author: Scotland. Privy Council.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by the heir of Andrew Anderson, printer to his most sacred Majesty,

notesStmt.note: At end of text: Given under our signet at Edinburgh, the 12. day of March, 1679, and of our reign the threttieth [sic] one year.
Steele notation: Arms 232 and ers day.
Reproduction of original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
